trans-unit.source: A workflow instance may be suspended in one of three ways: the host may call <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Suspend%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.SuspendActivity> activity may be invoked from inside the workflow instance, or the workflow runtime engine may suspend the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 工作流程執行個體可能以下列三種方式之一暫止：主機呼叫 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Suspend%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>、從工作流程執行個體內叫用 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.SuspendActivity> 活動，或工作流程執行階段引擎可能暫止工作流程執行個體。

trans-unit.source: When the workflow instance is suspended, the workflow runtime engine raises the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowSuspended?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 工作流程執行個體暫止時，工作流程執行階段引擎會引發 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowSuspended?displayProperty=nameWithType> 事件。

trans-unit.source: The host may subscribe to this event by adding an event handler to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowSuspended?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 主機會加入事件處理常式到 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowSuspended?displayProperty=nameWithType>，以訂閱此事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the description of why the workflow instance was suspended.
trans-unit.target: 取得工作流程執行個體暫止原因的描述。

trans-unit.source: The description of why the workflow instance was suspended.
trans-unit.target: 工作流程執行個體暫止原因的描述。

trans-unit.source: If the host suspends the workflow instance, it supplies a reason for the suspension in the `string` parameter to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Suspend%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如果主機暫止工作流程執行個體，它會在 `string` 參數中提供暫止的原因給 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Suspend%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: If the workflow is suspended by a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.SuspendActivity> activity, the reason is supplied by <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.SuspendActivity.Error%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如果是 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.SuspendActivity> 活動暫止工作流程，則由 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.SuspendActivity.Error%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 提供原因。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the workflow runtime engine supplies a reason for the suspension.
trans-unit.target: 否則由工作流程執行階段引擎提供暫止的原因。
